definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Four years after production stopped, the sight and sound of the GT is still breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 停产4年后，GT的“音容笑貌”仍旧牵动我心。

sentences.english: Safe in one another for almost three years past thinking Italian noble air.
sentences.chinese: 音容一别近三年，往事空思意浩然。

sentences.english: I see her face again though she is no longer with us. I even hear her voice, and recall her smile.
sentences.chinese: 虽然她已经不在世了，但我仍能忆起她的音容笑貌。

sentences.english: His happy laughter still rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 他的音容笑貌依然萦绕我们的耳际。

sentences.english: Tears stream down my cheeks when I recall the look of the deceased while in life.
sentences.chinese: 当我回忆死者在世时的音容笑貌时，不禁泪流满面。

sentences.english: They were imitating the look and actions of some spirits with floating long sleeves with superb skills.
sentences.chinese: 模仿灵鬼的音容笑貌，舞袖翩翻，技巧很高。

sentences.english: I still remember your smiles, your voice, your singing and all about you.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧记得你的音容笑貌，你的歌声和关于你的一切。

sentences.english: Didn't you know your face had already engrave in my mind ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否知道你的音容相貌已完全印入我的心里？

sentences.english: Recalling mother's face and smile how we could not feel distressed and bitter?
sentences.chinese: 追忆母亲的音容笑貌，我们怎么能不痛心疾首呢？

sentences.english: Teats stream down my cheeks when I recall the look of the deceased while in life.
sentences.chinese: 当我回忆死者在世时的音容笑貌时，不禁泪流满面。

sentences.english: Voice, looks, or lips, may answer thy demands?
sentences.chinese: 音容和唇吻满足你的企求？

sentences.english: His voice and expressions would always be deeply engraved in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的音容笑貌永远印刻在我记忆深处。

definition: as before/as usual/(to be) like old friends
quiet, silent, and lonely/far and indistinct/gone without a trace
separated by a generation/a lifetime ago
to fade into the distance/(fig.) to peter out/to fade away
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
